more: Ooh, this sounds interesting. Click here for more!
title: This Awesome Portfolio
description: Made my portfolio, and at the same time I rocked some cool new frameworks and played around to get slightly sharper at what I'm doing. Oh, also, awesome for showing off! Half-way through the project I switched from Sublime Text 3 to Brackets as my main text editor, and so far I love it. This was the final task for the course DH2627, Interaction Design at KTH. However, since I needed some sort of refuge in the stormy sea that is the internet, I probably made more than I needed to.
reflection: Looking back at the project and the code, it's somewhat apparent that I jumped the gun and failed to plan what and how I wanted the portfolio to work. It should probably be rewritten from scratch once I get the time.
process: This project has been pretty straight forward, as I worked alone I designed the page, implemented what I wanted and reworked the parts that I didn't like. It will continue to change until I'm satisfied, which will probably be... never? (Or until I remake it from scratch)
information: I really needed a portfolio, and it's been a blast doing it.
